entry.et: Middle English, from Old English gēse

dt.un: used as a function word to express assent or agreement are you ready? Yes, I am
used as a function word usually to introduce correction or contradiction of a negative assertion or direction don't say that! Yes, I will
used as a function word to introduce a more emphatic or explicit phrase
used as a function word to indicate uncertainty or polite interest or attentiveness

def.dt: :a person who agrees with everything that is said
:one who endorses or supports without criticism every opinion or proposal of an associate or superior

entry.et: Japanese ukiyo-e genre picture, from ukiyo world, life + e picture

def.dt: :a Japanese art movement that flourished from the 17th to the 19th century and produced paintings and prints depicting the everyday life and interests of the common people
